attributes.action: Judge Led Inquiry to investigate Stephen Lawrence Kent Police Inquiry
attributes.additional_details:
Theresa May must ensure that in the Judge led inquiry into Stephen Lawrence case takes full account

(1) A Kent Police Authority call for inquiry and report of August 1997 whilst Kent Police were conducting Lawrence Inquiry.

(2) That if Kent Police had complied and made inquiry they would have investigated Charlie Kray, Clifford Norris and Regional Crime Squad in which served Det Sgt John Davidson.

(3) That Ros Howells, Imran Khan and, hence, Doreen Lawrence and Michael Mansfield knew this compromise upon Kent Police but failed to tell Macpherson Inquiry

(4) That Jack Straw waited until after MacPherson Report was published before refusing to compel the inquiry.
